subject: #SSN5237
description_text:
Hi,

I have just received my order and there is no baseplate in the box. I
specifically selected that when purchasing, which you can tell by the price
that I paid for the set.

Can you please arrange for this to be sent out asap.

Kind Regards
Joseph Bowers

conversations.body_text: Hi Joseph Bowers,  The base plate may have been shipped separately. I will check for you and get back to you after the holiday.Â

Hi,

Have you heard anything regarding the baseplate for my order?

Kind Regards
Joseph Bowers

Hi, do you have an update? I am currently unable to use the product.

Kind Regards
Joseph Bowers

Hi,

Can you please respond to my previous queries. I am currently waiting for
the baseplate and have been unable to use the pedals up until now.

Kind Regards

Hi Joseph Bowers,    We apologize for the delayed response. We have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047243687519
